SEARCH

Class AppointmentSlotUtil

java.lang.Object
AppointmentSlotUtil
public class AppointmentSlotUtil extends Object
Utility class for generating and managing appointment time slots. Provides methods to create default scheduling slots and validate time periods.

  • Method Details

    • generateDailySlots

      public static List<TimeSlot> generateDailySlots()
      Generates a list of default time slots for the next 7 days. Creates hourly slots during standard clinic hours: Morning: 9 AM - 12 PM Afternoon: 2 PM - 5 PM
      Returns:
      List of TimeSlot objects

    • generateSlotsForDate

      public static List<TimeSlot> generateSlotsForDate(LocalDateTime date)
      Generates slots for a specific date
      Parameters:
      date - The date to generate slots for
      Returns:
      List of TimeSlot objects for the specified date

    • isWithinClinicHours

      public static boolean isWithinClinicHours(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Validates if a given time falls within clinic hours
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The datetime to validate
      Returns:
      true if the time is within clinic hours, false otherwise

    • getNextAvailableSlotTime

      public static LocalDateTime getNextAvailableSlotTime(LocalDateTime after)
      Gets the next available slot time after a given datetime
      Parameters:
      after - The datetime to start looking from
      Returns:
      The next available slot datetime, or null if none found today

    • formatDateTime

      public static String formatDateTime(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Formats a datetime for display in the UI
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The datetime to format
      Returns:
      Formatted string representation of the datetime

    • isValidSlotDuration

      public static boolean isValidSlotDuration(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Checks if a given slot duration is valid (currently fixed at 1 hour)
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time of the slot
      endTime - The end time of the slot
      Returns:
      true if the duration is valid, false otherwise
